passages.name: angelfucker
passages.text:
<<replace "The angel kept coming back and nobody said anything.">>The angel kept coming back and nobody said anything.

<<replace "They must have known.">>They must have known.

<<replace "The walls glow, or maybe the walls get clearer. But I don't think you could miss it.">>The walls glow, or maybe the walls get clearer. But I don't think you could miss it.

<<replace "And when it isn't happening:">>And when it isn't happening:

<<replace "They hear me dry heaving in the bathroom. They hear the vomit splashing into the toilet.">>They hear me dry heaving in the bathroom. They hear the vomit splashing into the toilet.

<<replace "They see me losing weight. They see me getting sunk-eyed. They see my hair falling out, getting thinner.">>They see me losing weight. They see me getting sunk-eyed. They see my hair falling out, getting thinner.

<<replace "Something snapped inside me, staring at the hair in the sink, and I woke up, stupid stupid stupid, no one will save you, no one cares.">>Something snapped inside me, staring at the hair in the sink, and I finally woke up, stupid stupid stupid, no one will save you, no one cares.

<<replace "No one cares when an angel touches you.">>No one cares when an angel touches you.

<<replace "I realized what I had to do.">>I realized what I had to do.

<<replace "I had to sacrifice my desire to be thought of as a good person.">>I had to sacrifice my desire to be thought of as a good person.

<<replace "Because I knew they'd say I'd been asking for it.">>Because I knew they'd say I'd been asking for it.

<<replace "Like I somehow deserved what happened to me.">>Like I somehow deserved what happened to me.

<<replace "I knew what they'd call me when I left.">>I knew what they'd call me when I left.

<<replace "They'd call me everything that had been done to me.">>They'd call me everything that had been done to me.<<timedgoto "angelfucked" 5s>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: hate
passages.text: I want them to feel pain. I want them to feel a fraction of what they did to me. I want to feel in control of my life again.\n\nI'm tired of turning the other cheek. I'm tired of feeling helpless. I'm tired of trying to get better while ignoring the things that hurt me. It's like trying to convalesce in a [[shark tank]].

passages.name: Untitled Passage 37
passages.text:
WHY DO I LIKE DIRTY LAUNDRY https://soundcloud.com/kellyrowlandofficial/dirty-laundry SO MUCH

<<replace "Why's dirty laundry so great">>Because it's a song about things that aren't supposed to be talked about...competition and jealousy and jealousy between women...abusive relationships...<<endreplace>>

<<replace "Heard someone call Kelly Rowland a guilty pleasure">>You're guilty about listening to music by women expressing emotional truths? Is it a sin?<<endreplace>>


//I was battered
He hitting the window like it was me, until it shattered
He pulled me out, he said, “Don’t nobody love you but me
Not your mama, not your daddy and especially not Bey”
He turned me against my sister
I missed ya
-Kelly Rowland, Dirty Laundry

so intense

"swear y'all don't know the half of this industry"

you wouldn't believe the horror behind the scenes. taught to put on a smile while you're being tortured. you come up as an artist trying to make things but those things get tangled in the mutating effects of your field. the field distorts your art--how it's received, the conditions in which it is made, the behavior of your peers--

The music, steady, drawn out, supports the vocals above all else

all the variations are perfectly in touch with her voice--horns and back-up vocals and strings that contribute to the build but don't overwhelm, the message is always supreme

So fast. So powerful. So absolute in their velocity.

You wanted to [[step]] into traffic.

The <<if $closet eq 1>><<hoverlink "walk" "closet" "closet is full of hands tangled in pantyhose and fallen hangers.">><<else>><<hoverlink "walk" "closet" "closet floor is covered in women's high heels">><<endif>>.

The <<if $fireplace eq 1>><<hoverlink "walk" "fireplace" "fireplace reeks with the smell of burning flesh as hands leap helplessly around on the coals">><<else>><<hoverlink "walk" "fireplace" "fireplace smolders with red-hot coals">><<endif>>.

passages.name: the center of the world
passages.text:
This feels like the center of the world.

Drunk humans swirl through the common spaces, conversate and kiss in the corners and side-halls. Machines spew color and belch [[tokens]]. Neon ceiling lights snake like lasers, outlining skylights vast with starry sky. [[Water]] runs through the casino in fountains, waterfalls, shallow canals arched by miniature bridges.

<<if $stammer eq 0>>[[Something bumps into you|dress]]<<else>>[[Look around]]<<endif>>

passages.text:
When you close your eyes you see a face. But it isn't the angel's face.

Because the angel is not the point.

The point is the human who sat in the next room and did nothing.

And a lot of people did nothing but one of them called themselves your friend.

<<cyclinglink $nemesis_gender "He" "She" "They">>?

passages.name: horror_height
passages.text:
Wake up in the mud with cold water on your eyelashes.

Hills are lower here. Black mud. Collapsed fenceposts. Barbed wire snakes through the ground.

The sun is hours across the earth.

[[Close your eyes|gender]]

passages.name: still
passages.text:
The fountain workings broke down a few weeks ago. This fact is a particle in the whirling growing impetus driving you to leave.

You used to love plunging your hands into the rippling water. So cool and wet. And most of all, the feeling that something in your slow, isolated part of the universe was moving and alive and changing.

Now your daily ritual is gone, and in its place a depressing reminder of [[stagnance|Fountain]].

passages.name: cry
passages.text:
I wish this weren't happening.

I wish things could have gone differently.

I wish I knew the perfect sequence of words that would fix things.

But I [[don't]].

passages.name: upstairs
passages.text: [[Your friend|get key]] is staring through the sea-window. Your [[room|my room]] is down the hall, past the candles. A [[stairwell|monastery interior]] leads downward.

passages.name: get key
passages.text:
<<if $key eq 0>>They turn to me. 

"Hey."

Through the window I see the ocean like melted grey metal. "I need the [[key]]."<<else>>Their head leans against the glass. Through the window I see the ocean like melted grey metal.

[[Away|upstairs]]<<endif>>

passages.name: throwing
passages.text:
The last time you saw your face, you were crying and your eyes were two black holes of mascara in the mirror and 

[[Swallow bile]]

[[Spit it out]]

The nautilus helps <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>them<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>him<<endif>> walk outside and you are alone.

Where was the showdown.

Where was the fire.

Walked through a wasteland of gasoline with a match in your mouth.

Something holds where before it would have broken.

I think I'll just keep moving [[forward|no death]].

passages.name: Auuughhh
passages.text:
"Fear of heights is not uncommon. Please help me understand what you need."

I lie down numbly on the floor and stare at the ceiling.

[["What are those things? Up there?"|whyy]]

passages.text:
I resented it so much when people told me I wouldn't kill myself.

As if I ever had a [[c|choice]][[h|choice]][[o|choice]][[i|choice]][[c|choice]][[e|choice]].

passages.text:
<<set $light3 += 1>><<if $light3 lt 2>><<playsound "light.mp3">><<endif>><<set $light_stage3 += 1>><<if $light3 lt 35>><<timedgoto "angel light 3" 0.1s>><<endif>><<if $light3 lt 35>><<if $light_stage3 eq 1>><<set $light_stage3 = -1>>MY BLOOD ITCHES

TORTURED FOR 1000 YEARS IN MY ROOM WHILE PEOPLE PLAY NINTENDO IN THE LIVING ROOM<<else>> <<endif>><<else>>[[MY BLOOD ITCHES|angelfucker]]

[[TORTURED FOR 1000 YEARS IN MY ROOM WHILE PEOPLE PLAY NINTENDO IN THE LIVING ROOM|angelfucker]]<<endif>>

links.text: TORTURED FOR 1000 YEARS IN MY ROOM WHILE PEOPLE PLAY NINTENDO IN THE LIVING ROOM

passages.name: panic attack
passages.text:
Heartbeat hum. Dizzy throb. Bile rears up in your mouth like a serpent of acid.

"Are you okay? Do you need a doctor?"

[[Auuughhh]]

passages.name: old room
passages.text:
In my room.

My old room.

[[Lying in bed]]

passages.name: angel light 2
passages.text:
<<set $light2 += 1>><<if $light2 lt 2>><<playsound "light.mp3">><<endif>><<set $light_stage2 += 1>><<if $light2 lt 35>><<timedgoto "angel light 2" 0.1s>><<endif>><<if $light2 lt 35>><<if $light_stage2 eq 1>><<set $light_stage2 = -1>>THE BUZZING FEELS LIKE RADIATION

I FEEL MY SKIN IS CHANGED ON A FUNDAMENTAL LEVEL<<else>> <<endif>><<else>>[[THE BUZZING FEELS LIKE RADIATION|angel light 3]]

[[I FEEL MY SKIN IS CHANGED ON A FUNDAMENTAL LEVEL|angel light 3]]<<endif>>

links.text: I FEEL MY SKIN IS CHANGED ON A FUNDAMENTAL LEVEL

passages.name: rihanna-quote
passages.text: [[All I see is signs.|rihanna-quote-exit]]\n

passages.name: darkness
passages.text: Falling asleep on the dead warm leaves of some forest floor.\n\n[[Falling|old room]]

passages.name: Black skeletons
passages.text:
The skeletons are contorted like they were like trying to escape their own body. Like each limb was twisting itself away from a tortured central nervous system.

You've been there.

<<back>>

passages.name: sun
passages.text: Walking down the chalk <<replace "road,">>road, the sun [[flashes|white-flash]] from behind a cloud.<<endreplace>><<stopsound "chimes.mp3">>

passages.name: sunburnt
passages.text: Dead hands blistered black in the sun. Fingers snap under your heel no matter how carefully you <<replace "step">>step.\n\nYou come to the rim of the [[forest|forest-darkness]].<<endreplace>>

passages.name: emotions
passages.text: [[resentment|Resentment]][[fascination|Fascination]][[dread|Dread]]\n

passages.name: Water
passages.text: You dip a finger in the running water. It is freezing cold.\n\n<<back>>

passages.name: Silencer
passages.text:
"I...guess you aren't accepting my forfeit."

[[Silence|Silencest]]

[[Speak in sorrow]]

passages.name: my thing
passages.text:
"I need to...feel strong again. I need to stop being scared."

They hug you.

[[Hug|the key-happy]]

passages.name: casinos
passages.text:
So you have a mountain full of casinos but next to none of them are used that way. Most were stripped out and converted to residences, garish floors divided into living quarters, people eating their meals on roulette tables.

Zoning standards are still enforced by the League (ever devoid of pragmatism), so it is customary for residents to keep a small token slot machine in their home, carved from stone or wood, squatting like a family idol.

<<back>>

passages.name: the key-happy
passages.text:
They squeeze your shoulder and hand you the key.

"I really hope you find what you need out there."

[["Thanks."|upstairs]]<<set $key = 1>>

passages.name: Unfold your aching hand
passages.text:
Rub those scars in your <<replace "palm.">>palm.

Four equidistant points like the tips of a square.

[[Leave|radiance-darkness]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: How much
passages.text:
"I am not a human being. My labor is worthless.

The ride is free."

[[Ride]]

passages.name: burn
passages.text: <<replace "Burning.">><<replace "Burnt.">>Ash.\n\n[[Okay.|regrets]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<set $paper -= 1>>

passages.name: faceless
passages.text:
You put back the empty bottle.

So many locked up faces. Their murky dance.

[[Turn away|remember]]

passages.name: Swallow bile
passages.text:
Tastes good.

Perfect control. Perfect serenity. Nothing is revealed until the time is right.

[[I am the weapon|basement]]

passages.text: \n<<set $flash += 1>><<if $flash gt 35>><<timedgoto "end-flash" 0.001s>><<else>><<timedgoto "dark-flash" 0.001s>><<endif>>

<<if $wound eq "jaw">>You speak slowly, speaking around the pain of your jaw.

[["I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["No."|reject forfeit]]<<else>>[["I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["No."|reject forfeit]]<<endif>>

passages.name: Take mask
passages.text: You strap it on and stare awkwardly through the eyeholes.\n\n[[Go inside]]

The fly is under the glass, not inside it.<<set $fly = 1>><<endreplace>><<else>><<if $water gt 0>>The water trembles every so often to the surge of hydraulic pumps in the walls.<<else>>It rattles every so often to the surge of hydraulic pumps in the walls.<<endif>><<endif>>

passages.text:

passages.name: reject forfeit
passages.text:
No.

We play.

Silence, then the sound of <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>them<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>him<<endif>> swallowing.

"Please."

[[Silence|something]]

passages.name: disastrous
passages.text:
I wanted it to be out of my control.

So that when the moment came.

There would be nothing I could do to [[stop]] it.

passages.name: key
passages.text:
There is no expression to <<replace "read.">>read.

"I'll be sorry to see you go."

[["I'll miss you too."|miss]]

[["I have what I came for."|have]]

[["I need to stand on my own feet again."|my thing]]

<<endreplace>>

links.text: "I need to stand on my own feet again."

passages.name: alone
passages.text: Legs, arms thrashing, I'm kicking like I'm drowning, and it takes a while to understand I'm not in my old bedroom, I'm in a forest and the night is dark and the moon is lost behind clouds and canopy and I am alone.\n\n[[Never sleep again|hand-darkness]]

passages.name: Okay
passages.text:
They go inside and come back with <<rnd "an obsidian" "an ivory" "an emerald" "a topaz" "a sapphire" "an iolite">> mask textured like <<rnd "feathers" "scales" "chitin">> and covered in <<rnd "gems" "coagulated slime" "spikes">>.

[[Take it|Take mask]]

passages.name: no death
passages.text:
Forward through traffic.

Just slower.

Looking at the lights.

With someone else's hand in mine.

The seed of the hand that will one [[day]] bloom into a real hand of flesh and blood.

passages.name: true-wake
passages.text:
The <<if $jungle eq 1>>jungle horizon, silver with morning mist.<<endif>><<if $sea eq 1>>horizon of the sea, silver with morning mist.<<endif>><<if $desert eq 1>>sun is rising up over the dunes.<<endif>>

Your hand is painfully clenched, nails digging inside palm.

[[Unfold your aching hand]]

passages.name: bide
passages.text: You get [[lost|bide-darkness]] in the crowd.

passages.name: Silence
passages.text:
"Did you hear me? I forfeit."

[[Silence|Silencer]]

[[Speak in anger]]

passages.name: collides
passages.text: You [[slam]] into a slot machine.<<stopsound "traffic.mp3">>

passages.name: merciless
passages.text:
<<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I'm sorry.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I cried when I knew I'd lost you forever.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I was scared.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I was a coward.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I don't know how to be a good person.">>
 <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I'd do anything to change what happened.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "I cried so many days since then, thinking what I'd done to you.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "Please let me fix things.">> <<hoverlink "merciless" "RAGE" "Please.">>

[[Silence|dust]]

[[Relent|accept forfeit]]

passages.name: placard
passages.text:
"Cast your regrets into the fire."

[[Back|regrets]]

passages.text: <<if $stash eq "icebox">><<set $icebox = 1>><<endif>><<if $stash eq "closet">><<set $closet = 1>><<endif>><<if $stash eq "fireplace">><<set $fireplace = 1>><<endif>><<if $stash eq "garbage disposal">><<set $garbage_disposal = 1>><<endif>><<display "hands">>

passages.name: But.
passages.text: But there's a [[bitter]] taste behind the sweet.

passages.name: immortals-quote-exit
passages.text:
//There is a rumour and a radiance of wings above my head,
An intolerable radiance of wings...//
-Rubert Brooke, Sleeping Out: Full Moon
<<timedgoto "radiance-darkness" 4s>>

passages.name: bottle menu
passages.text:
In the bottle float <<cyclinglink $eyes "black" "blue" "purple" "green" "amber" "gray" "hazel" "red">> eyes, lips <<cyclinglink $lips "cracked with dehydration" "plump and red" "curled pale" "soft and innocent, prone to trembling">>, and your <<cyclinglink $nose "aquiline" "broken" "snub" "upturned" "pointed" "crooked">> nose.

You shake it a little and see <<cyclinglink $other "purple freckling on your nose and cheeks" "a lip ring with spiky nose studs" "flowery spiral tattoo flowing from your left eye">>.

[[Drink deep.|sweet]]
<<set $key = 2>>

passages.name: shapetalk1
passages.text:
The currency of the east is three shapes. Always three shapes.

If a task is worth money, it is structured formally so someone receives a shape.

There are three beneficiaries of each job or task, each receiving a single shape. Circle is least, square is between, and triangle is top.

<<back>>

Yes
passages.text:
<<print $nemesis_gender>> did nothing.

Where was <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> [[heart|happy]].

[[Remove mask]]

[[Say nothing]]

passages.text:
Burnt by your own anger, like picking up a hot knife.

Until you <<replace "realized.">>realized.

You are that [[knife|basement]].<<endreplace>>

passages.name: unfold
passages.text: Blood pours from your palm.\n\n[[Burns|true-wake]] like hot sand through your fingers.

passages.text: [[I am starved and curveless.|quote-anorexic-exit]]\n[[I am skin and bone.|quote-anorexic-exit]]\n[[She has learned her lesson.|quote-anorexic-exit]]

passages.name: bridge
passages.text: The wood creaks and beams are missing but you make it [[across|wind]].\n\nOf course you do. The feeling persists that you will survive in some misshapen, rotten, miserable, cockroach form until you meet your ultimate fate.

passages.text:
Swirled mineral white.

[[Back|blood room]]

<<if $ai_health eq 0>>Your nemesis smiles tightly.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 250>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She licks her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They lick their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He licks his<<endif>> lips.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 500>>Your nemesis drums <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> fingers restlessly.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 750>>Your nemesis looks pale.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 1000>>You can see <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> heart beating through <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> shirt.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 1250>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>Her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>Their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>His<<endif>> rapid breathing fills the silence.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 1500>>Sweat trickles from behind <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> mask and traces down <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> neck. You can tell it's a struggle for <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>them<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>him<<endif>> to keep silent.<<endif>><<if $ai_health eq 1750>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She is<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They are<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He is<<endif>> deathly pale. <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>Her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>Their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>His<<endif>> lids are drooping.<<endif>>

<<if $human_health eq 0>>You feel j<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<replace "u">>u<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>>ust fine.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 250>>A tinge of nausea.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 500>>Your skin is looking a little pale.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 750>>Your skin itches. You shake your leg restlessly.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 1000>>Piss seeps from between your legs with a tingle.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 1250>>Sweat pours down your face.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 1500>>You breath rapidly, cold air cutting your nostrils.<<endif>><<if $human_health eq 1750>>You look down at your ashy hands, struggling for vision.<<endif>>

passages.name: miss
passages.text:
Their voice gets small and shy. "Aww. Thanks.

I...

I hope someday, things are better for you."

[["I'm never getting better."|the key]]

[["Me too. Take care."|the key-happy]]

passages.name: creek
passages.text:
Sunlight drops like pins through the canopy and sparks on the creek.

[[Get your feet wet?|get wet]]

[[Look for a way around|around]]
<<loopsound "stream.mp3">>

passages.name: Get up
passages.text: You [[collapse]].\n\n

passages.name: poem
passages.text:
<<set $poem += 1>><<if $poem eq 0>>//the sea took my daughter and there is nothing i can do to the sea.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 1>>//i am now as i was then.

my hands still remind me of

her hands so long in the water, black in the water

my hands clawing rubies from my thighs in teeth-grinding blind heat.//<<endif>><<endif>><<if $poem eq 2>>//i am now as i was then

and when my daughtered friends are laughing in the sun

for me it’s still 3 AM.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 3>>//i see how people look at me in church

guess they heard some things.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 4>>//i see how people look at me in church

guess they heard some things.

they say i wasn’t careful enough

maybe i wasn’t careful enough

i guess god could tell you if i was <<replace "careful enough">>careful enough

but <<replace "honey">>honey

you don’t know god.<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 5>>//i don’t come back to church.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 6>>//i was a bad mother

i will always be that bad mother.

thanks, waves.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 7>>//i was not enough on her bad nights

and now those nights are here for me.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 8>>//she catches me constantly

i am trapped with her in the shower

she flashes every third thought

in bed i burn her to the ceiling

and i can’t open this Pepsi without thinking about her//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 9>>//she catches me constantly

i am trapped with her in the shower

she flashes every third thought

in bed i burn her to the ceiling

and i can’t open this Pepsi without thinking about her

because i am always thinking about her.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 10>>//i keep my hands on my lap where i can see them

and the other moms will never know how much i want to rip their wombs out

and fix my big horrible problem.//<<endif>><<if $poem eq 11>>//don’t hand me that water bottle

that’s insensitive

you know i only drink shit these days//<<set $woman = 1>><<endif>><<if $poem eq 12>>She stares at the night sky.<<endif>><<if $poem eq 13>>She goes inside.<<endif>>

<<if $poem lt 13>>[[Listen|poem]]<<else>>[[Get up|Patio]]<<endif>>

passages.name: red tile
passages.text: Deeper on the inside than they are on the outside.\n\nA basket of these will contain the sum of your [[veins]].

passages.name: quote-1
passages.text: [[In the prosecution of this infernal design, they are diligent in the highest degree. To find out the most effectual means of putting it into execution, they apply to this end the whole force of their angelical understanding...|quote-1-exit]]

links.text: In the prosecution of this infernal design, they are diligent in the highest degree. To find out the most effectual means of putting it into execution, they apply to this end the whole force of their angelical understanding...

passages.name: elevator
passages.text:
Faded blue paint over thick-cut wood. Heavy machinery arches above the elevator, drooling a cable down through the wood and into the mist.

The nautilus hums softly as it pastes papers to the ceiling.

<<back>>

passages.name: why
passages.text:
"I'm trying to make a night sky."

The paper is ticket stubs. A star is scribbled on each. The stars are barely visible, weak graphite drowned out by the thick black print of words and numbers.

[["You can't really see the stars"|stars]]

passages.name: say something
passages.text:
<<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She looks like she's going to say something<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They look like they're going to say something<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He looks like he's going to say something<<endif>>, when the proctor comes in, an upright nautilus construct with burgundy enameled shell.

The proctor sets something to the table in front of you. 

<<replace "Click.">>A [[red tile]].<<endreplace>>

passages.name: bump
passages.text: Hard metal surface [[collides]] with your ribs

passages.name: window
passages.text: Moss-fringed glass carries a glimpse of grey sky.\n\n<<back>>

passages.name: Get your bottle
passages.text:
You grab your bottle. Crammed way in the back, your napsack, smeared with white dust from the chalky coastal road.

You drag it out and drop it to the side. Soft metal clink.

Still holding your [[bottle|bottle menu]].

passages.name: angelz
passages.text:
The angel slithers across the ceiling, cilia flowing along its bony white carapace.

<<replace "Scream">>Your throat feels tight. Nothing comes out.<<set $react += 1>><<if $react eq 3>><<timedgoto "angel light" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>

<<replace "Run">>Can't move. Like something is sitting on your chest.<<set $react += 1>><<if $react eq 3>><<timedgoto "angel light" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>

<<replace "Fight">>Your fingers twitch.<<set $react += 1>><<if $react eq 3>><<timedgoto "angel light" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: shapetalk3
passages.text:
You always had trouble figuring out what to pay people, or whether to pay for certain things at all. A highly formalized yet unspoken system.

You just freeze up trying to evaluated the worth of an object, or even harder, an act.

<<back>>

passages.name: shapetalk2
passages.text:
Say someone creates a painting and puts it up for sale. They get the triangle.

The painter's agent, responsible for selling the painting, gets the square.

The person who safely delivers the painting gets the circle.

<<back>>

passages.name: darkness of the end
passages.text: <<timedgoto "end" 3s>>

passages.name: anorexic-darkness
passages.text: <<timedgoto "quote-anorexic" 3s>>

passages.name: accept forfeit
passages.text: "I accept your forfeit."\n\n<<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She looks<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They look<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He looks<<endif>> at you for what seems like forever and finally speak in a small, broken [[voice]].

passages.name: bitter
passages.text: Wish I could take any bottle but my <<replace "own.">>own.<<timedgoto "hurt you" 2.5s>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: dropping
passages.text: Then some animating force leaves the wingspan\n\nAnd it drops<<timedgoto "dropped" 3s>>

passages.name: circle-mask
passages.text: Their mouth looks angry under the mask. "So generous."\n\nThey stand just barely aside, so you have to [[press past|the center of the world]] the contour of their body under their suit, fabric reeking of perfume, cigarettes.<<set $circle = 1>>

passages.name: opponent
passages.text:
You stare at <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>them<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>him<<endif>>. <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She stares<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They stare<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He stares<<endif>> back through <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>their<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>his<<endif>> mask.

How does it feel after so long.

[[Nothing. I feel nothing.|nothing]]

[[Hate. Hate. Hate.|hate]]

[[I feel like I'm going to cry.|cry]]

links.text: I feel like I'm going to cry.

passages.name: shark tank
passages.text:
I'm not getting better. I'm shit. I'm broken. I'm wasted. I'm ruined. I'm sick.

[[I need this hate to survive|say something]]

links.text: I need this hate to survive

passages.name: triangle-signer
passages.text:
The triangle clinks into the jar.

They look up from the form. "I'm sorry, there must have been a mistake? All I did was write your name down."<<set $triangle = 1>>

[[Walk away|bide]]

passages.name: stars
passages.text:
"But I know they're there."

Creak creak.

[["Do you ever look at real stars?"|real stars]]

links.text: "Do you ever look at real stars?"

passages.name: Approach
passages.text:
The grass under your feet turns dark.

Something is [[flapping|sick_angel]] in the periphery of your vision.

passages.name: get wet
passages.text:
Your sneakers fill with water. The dust and salt on your soles melts away. Tiny fish swim through the holes and nibble your toes.

[[Splash splash splash|rustle]]

passages.name: fire
passages.text: Years of regret burnt to homogenous ashes.\n\n[[Back|regrets]]

passages.name: tap
passages.text: <<replace "Tap.">>[[Tap.|options]]<<endreplace>>

passages.name: elevator box
passages.text:
A nautilus construct is hunched inside. It says, "Would you like a ride to the city?"

[["How much"|How much]]

[["Not right now"|foot]]

passages.name: hurt
passages.text:
Shriveled black my [[hand]]

Burnt my [[face]] until it twisted my lip and broke open my jaw

No bruises, just reached inside my [[heart]]

passages.name: tokens
passages.text: Plastic gold tokens. Exchange 100 of them for a circle-square-triangle set.\n\n<<back>>

passages.name: hmm
passages.text:
Pale, cold body on a slab in the casino mortuary.

The coroner sifts through your pockets. She comes up with a <<if $circle eq 0>>brass circle<<endif>><<if $triangle eq 0>>silver triangle<<endif>><<if $square eq 0>>gold square. She pockets it.<<endif>>
<<timedgoto "darkness of the end" 4s>>

passages.name: square-mask
passages.text: They accept the square with a graceful flourish and snap it under their sleeve, pivoting to the side to let you [[pass|the center of the world]].\n\n<<set $square = 1>>

passages.name: blood room
passages.text: <<if $blood_timer gt 6>>Your [[opponent]] enters the room.<<else>>[[Red chair]]. [[White table]]. A glass of [[water]].<<endif>>

passages.name: glides
passages.text: A [[shadow]] glides across the grass, too fast for a cloud.

passages.name: grace
passages.text: If they walk into the sea, they can expect to get [[drowned|basement]].

passages.name: Number words script
remember
passages.text:
You catch a glimpse of your face in the glass of the cabinets.

How does it feel?

[[Like I'm coming home stronger|stronger]]

[[I feel like throwing up|throwing]]

passages.name: sound
my room
passages.text:
Newspaper [[clippings]] plaster the wall over a cozy cot. A tiny [[window]] sheds faint light on the room.

[[Leave|upstairs]]

passages.name: room
passages.text:
The room is white marble, chilled by the [[ice water]] flowing through the walls and floor.

A white table with two red chairs.

[[Approach|blood room]]

passages.name: forest-darkness
passages.text: <<timedgoto "darkness" 3s>>

passages.name: whyy
passages.text:
"I'm trying to make a night sky."

The paper is discarded tickets. A star is scribbled on each. The stars are barely visible, weak graphite drowned out by the thickly printed words and numbers of the tickets.

[["You can't really see the stars"|stars]]

passages.name: Resentment
passages.text:
<<set $resentment += 1>><<if $resentment eq 1>>Paralyzed. Stuck.

Stuck hating.<<endif>><<if $resentment eq 2>>The object of your hate was absent so long you turned the hate inward.<<endif>><<if $resentment eq 3>>I blamed myself for what you did to me.<<endif>><<if $resentment eq 4>>With gruesome heat I imagine overturning the master of my emotions since that day.

I know you aren't the same angel. But you'll do (and you'll do is the energy fueling history, strangers obliterated by echoes).<<endif>>

<<if $resentment eq 4>>[[Crunch|resentment_height]]<<else>>[[Burn|emotions]]<<endif>>

passages.name: nemesis
passages.text: They disappear in the direction of the upper floor games.\n\nYou [[check]] the sign-up sheets.

passages.name: slam
passages.text: The slot machine is half-buried in the soft earth, mouth clogged with dirt and leaves.\n\n[[Look around|foot]]

passages.name: transition-tower
passages.text: <<timedgoto "rihanna-quote" 2.5s>>

passages.name: step
passages.text:
I suspected traffic held the secret to communicating the hurt I had spent so long trying and failing to convey.

<<cyclinglink $secret "It felt like a stage where anyone could be a star. Where headlights became spotlights and your performance could not be ignored." "A breathless whirling stream where time stood still." "The solution to all my problems.">>

There was no prerequisite. You just needed to take a step. Then another step.

[[Bump|bump]]

passages.name: look-result
passages.text:
<<if $look eq "left">>


<<endif>>


<<if $look eq "forward">>

<<if $rihanna eq 1>>I shuffle through some CDs. Consecrated by markers, defiled by scratches and dusty shoeprints.<<endif>>
<<if $rihanna eq 2>>I lean back, soaking in the warmth of the leather.<<endif>>
<<if $rihanna eq 3>>I lean back, soaking in the warmth of the leather.<<endif>>

<<endif>>


<<if $look eq "right">>

<<if $rihanna lt 15>>The sun on the water burns my eyes.<<endif>>

<<endif>>

passages.name: grass
passages.text: Fluffy seagreen grass ripples around your ankles.\n\n[[You feel cold|glides]]

passages.name: ice water
passages.text: A dizzying sense that you stand on a frozen stone lake, surrounded by the opaque mist of the marble walls.\n\n<<back>>

passages.name: cages
passages.text:
Restless blackbirds.

[[Back|monastery]]

passages.name: something
passages.text: Your nemesis is saying [[something|merciless]].

passages.name: heart
passages.text:
No bruises, just reached inside my heart and touched it with a finger of white-hot light and

burned me

where nobody could see

[[But me|accept]]
<<set $wound = "heart">>

passages.name: monastery interior
passages.text:
The soft morning light of the [[courtyard|monastery]] gives way to dark halls and musty alcoves. Moths cluster at opaque windows, nibbling on tarnished light.

A stairwell curves [[upward|upstairs]]. At the end of the south hallway, steep steps descend into the [[basement]].
<<fadeoutsound "chimes.mp3">>

passages.name: Look outside
passages.text:
Through blood-smeared glass you gaze on miles of plain covered in dead hands.

The hand elemental swarms into the sky, traveling like a devil's cloud to the west.

[[Go east|sunburnt]]

passages.name: rihanna-darkness
passages.text: <<timedgoto "the tower" 3s>>

passages.name: thirsty
passages.text:
Wasn't there a pool of mineral water near the entrance?

You step softly. Don't want to wake the others.

[[Step]]

passages.name: Random text script
Nah
passages.text:
Everything from that time feels contaminated. Filthy.

Need to start a fire somewhere and throw away everything I own until I'm standing naked.

[[Hhh|inventory]]

passages.name: demon
passages.text:
You pass through the city, hugging yourself against the cold mountain air. Drafts of warmth blast from glass doors swinging to the careen of drunk nightlifers and back-from-workers.

You know the building you need.

The [[last casino]].

passages.name: accept
passages.text:
<<replace "You always had a choice.">>You always had a choice.

<<replace "Drink or remain faceless.">>Drink or remain faceless.

But it hurts, being [[faceless]].<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: sleeping
passages.text:
There is no wall facing the outside. You lie on your side, facing the <<if $jungle eq 1>>jungle canopy silver with moonlight<<endif>><<if $sea eq 1>>sea waves silver with moonlight<<endif>><<if $desert eq 1>>sand dunes silver with moonlight<<endif>>.

You've strewn the contents of your napsack by your bed. The smooth stone floor radiates with heat from the day, while cool air comes through the gap in the wall.

By the light of the moon you look at your [[things|inventory]].

passages.name: char
they squeeze
passages.text: <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She squeezes<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They squeeze<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He squeezes<<endif>>.<<timedgoto "their outcome" 1.5s>>\n

passages.name: hover
dropped
passages.text:
Then some animating force leaves the wingspan

And it drops

With a sick crunch to the ground<<timedgoto "Approach" 3s>>

passages.name: have
passages.text:
"I'm envious. Some days I feel better....

But most days it's just, day one, day one, same as I got here."

They lean their head against the window. 

"But the routine helps."

[[Nod|the key]]

passages.name: voice
passages.text:
"I'm sorry.

I don't deserve this."

[["There is no fucking deserve."|There is no fucking deserve.]]

passages.name: dress
passages.text:
A woman in a low-cut evening dress. A hideous, scaly creature peeks from her cleavage, claws scraping listlessly at her breasts.

[[She glances at you|her]]

passages.name: check
passages.text:
Your nemesis is signed up for the 11:30 PM Red Tile.

//Opposition: Currently vacant.

Experienced players only, please.//

A concierge is stationed at the desk.

[[Sign up]]

passages.name: demasked-hate
passages.text:
<<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She becomes<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They become<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He becomes<<endif>> very still.

<<if $wound eq "jaw">>You speak slowly, enunciating around the pain of your jaw.

[["But hey, I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["There isn't going to be a forfeit."|reject forfeit]]<<else>>[["But hey, I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["There isn't going to be a forfeit."|reject forfeit]]<<endif>>

links.text: "There isn't going to be a forfeit."

passages.name: collapse
passages.text:
You watch <<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>her<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>them<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>him<<endif>> from your resting place under the table, cool tile on your broken cheekbone.

[[Staring sideways|our death]]

passages.name: happy
passages.text:
You remember a time when you were <<replace "happy">>happy

<<replace "whole">>whole

[[healthy|dancing]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: bottles
passages.text: We keep our faces in glass bottles so the angels can't see us.\n\n<<back>>

passages.name: dancing
passages.text:
Measured my health in

<<set $dancing += 1>><<if $dancing eq 1>>[[Dancing|dancing]] around my bedroom<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 3>>Dancing [[around|dancing]] my bedroom<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 2>>Dancing around [[my|dancing]] bedroom<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 4>>Dancing around my [[bedroom|dancing]]<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 5>>[[Flying|dancing]] around my bedroom<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 6>>Flying around my [[dreamscape|dancing]]<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 7>>[[Spinning|dancing]] as I<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 8>>Spinning on one foot as I [[lift|dancing]]<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 9>>Spinning on one foot as I lift my arms

And see myself [[as god sees me|dancing]]<<endif>><<if $dancing eq 10>>Spinning on one foot as I lift my arms

And see myself as god sees me

Worthy of [[love|disintegrate]]<<set $dancing = 0>><<endif>>

passages.text: <<set $r = Math.round(Math.random() * 2)>><<if $r eq 0>><<rnd "Dust hisses" "Blood drips" "Pus oozes" "Ichor seeps">> <<rnd "purple" "yellow" "black" "runny" "green" "white" "brown" "stinking">> from the <<rnd "shattered" "smashed" "caved-in">> <<rnd "skull" "cranium">>.<<endif>><<if $r eq 1>><<rnd "Purple" "Yellow" "Black" "Green" "White" "Brown">> <<rnd "pus" "ichor" "oil" "blood" "goo">> <<rnd "ebbs" "drips" "oozes" "spurts" "runs">> from <<rnd "cracked" "splintered" "smashed">> <<rnd "marrow" "bone" "skull" "jaw">>.<<endif>><<if $r eq 2>><<rnd "Dull" "Monotonous" "Blunt">> <<rnd "smack" "thud">> of <<rnd "fists" "sneakers">> hitting <<rnd "meat" "flesh">>, <<rnd "purple" "yellow" "black" "runny" "green" "white" "brown" "stinking">> bruises and <<rnd "oozing" "ruptured" "glistening">> <<rnd "mess" "chaos" "filth">> of flesh.<<endif>><<set $crunch += 1>>\n\n<<if $crunch gt 14>>[[Dizzy|gender]]<<else>>[[Swing|resentment_height]]<<endif>>

passages.name: mortuary-darkness
passages.text: <<timedgoto "darkness of the end" 4s>>

passages.name: Check napsack
passages.text: You rustle around inside. Nothing seems stolen.\n\n[[Wait]]

passages.name: rustles
passages.text: <<replace "Grabs hold of you">><<replace "Jerk away">>Just the sleeve of your hoody tangled on a branch.\n\n[[Hhh|wind]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: note
passages.text:
Recipes for bitter pastes said to soothe angel burns, superstitions for avoiding their path, relaxation techniques (for everything depends on the readiness of the mind).

Something is [[scribbled]] in the margin.

[[Put note away|inventory]]

passages.name: rules
passages.text:
The nautilus intones in a corrugated voice:

"We play by Standard Rules.

Reveal palm after each grip. The tile must be [[wet]]. Then toss the tile in the basket to your right.

No one leaves the table unless both parties forfeit or one wins."

[[Okay|table]]

passages.name: hoody
passages.text:
Purple hoody with pink stars on it.

Is it still you?

[[Nah]]
[[Yeah|inventory]]

passages.name: Demon Carriage
passages.text:
The doorperson stands in your path.

"You can't go in there naked."

They wear a <<rnd "purple" "black" "red" "white">> suit and <<rnd "an obsidian" "an ivory" "an emerald" "a topaz" "a sapphire" "an iolite">> mask studded with gems. Over their shoulder, through the flashing lights and smoke haze, you see everyone has a mask on.

<<if $wound eq "jaw">>They look at your jaw and their lip curls.

"You look like you need one anyways."

[[Okay]]<<else>>[[Okay]]<<endif>>

passages.name: Across the room
passages.text: Across the room.<<timedgoto "your nemesis" 2s>>

I'm carrying:

-a crumpled [[note]]

-my [[hoody]]

-a gold [[square|shapetalk2]]

-a silver [[triangle|shapetalk3]]

Your arm aches.">><<replace "Display tile.">>[[Wet.|they squeeze]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<else>><<replace "Display tile.">>[[Wet.|they squeeze]]<<endreplace>><<endif>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: Untitled Passage 28
passages.text: We worship pain for its constancy, and we look down on love because it dares to be impermanent

passages.name: Sign up
passages.text:
"I'd like to sign up for the 11:30 Red Tile."

"Red Tile?" They glance at your hand.

[[Flash palm|four scars]]

passages.text: Hands plaster the window like darkening locusts.<<timedgoto "hands" 5s>><<loopsound "hands.mp3">>

quote-1-exit
passages.text: In the prosecution of this infernal design, they are diligent in the highest degree. To find out the most effectual means of putting it into execution, they apply to this end the whole force of their angelical understanding...\n-John Wesley, Of Evil Angels\n<<timedgoto "dark-begin" 3s>>

passages.name: begin
passages.text: I train to fight angels in a [[monastery]] by the sea.

passages.name: dark-begin
passages.text: <<timedgoto "begin" 2.5s>>

passages.name: triangle-mask
passages.text:
Their eyes get big, then relax again.

You understand that they think you're stupid and that this generous payment is simply another affirmation in their lifelong ego parade where they are great and everyone else is shit.

They stand aside with an exaggerated bow, fingers outstretched toward the [[flashing interior|the center of the world]].<<set $diamond = 1>>

passages.name: monastery
passages.text:
A courtyard of pale dirt and blue grass. Sea breeze pours over the high stone walls. <<set $r = Math.round(Math.random() * 10)>><<if $r eq 8>>Seagulls caw in the distance.<<endif>><<if $r eq 9>>A lone gull glides overhead.<<endif>><<if $r eq 10>>Hmm.<<endif>>

The [[monastery|monastery interior]], squat, wooden, caulked, spired, sheltering a [[fountain|Fountain]], dangling with chimes and [[cages]]. In the opposite direction, the [[gate|Gate]].
<<loopsound "chimes.mp3" >>

passages.name: Ride
passages.text:
The elevator creaks back and forth as it rises up the mountainside.

The nautilus construct wads pieces of paper with spit and pastes them to the roof of the elevator.

[["Why are you doing that"|why]]

[[Sudden panic attack|panic attack]]

passages.name: Red chair
passages.text:
Like lacquered blood.

[[Back|blood room]]

<<set $blood_timer += 1>>

passages.name: hand
passages.text:
My black hand, my cracked hand

fried gauntlet of some dark knight who couldn't get the last piece of her armor off when she came back from the war.

[[That war never left my head|accept]]
<<set $wound = "hand">>

links.text: That war never left my head

passages.name: demasked
passages.text:
<<if $nemesis_gender eq "She">>She becomes<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "Their">>They become<<endif>><<if $nemesis_gender eq "He">>He becomes<<endif>> very still.

<<if $wound eq "jaw">>You speak slowly, speaking around the pain of your jaw.

[["I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["I reject your forfeit."|reject forfeit]]<<else>>[["I accept your forfeit."|accept forfeit]]

[["I reject your forfeit."|reject forfeit]]<<endif>>

passages.name: transition-2
passages.text: <<timedgoto "immortals-quote" 2.5s>>

passages.name: Dread
passages.text:
<<set $horror += 1>><<if $horror eq 1>>The same old helpless feelings. Paralyzed. Stuck.

Day one. Day one.<<endif>><<if $horror eq 2>>A dead angel at your feet doesn't change anything. If the mind is gone, the body can no longer pay.<<endif>><<if $horror eq 3>>Thin watery bile burns your throat and drools through your teeth. Your eyes swim.<<endif>>

<<if $horror gt 2>>[[Black out|horror_height]]<<else>>[[Hhnn|emotions]]<<endif>>

passages.name: sick_angel
passages.text:
Dead angel dripping black pus, broke wing tilting with the wind.

You focus on the techniques you learned in the monastery.

Deep breathing.

Heartbeat by heartbeat.

Catechism of anatomical weak spots--the tiny bird's bone in their armpit, weak to a sudden[[--|emotions]]

passages.name: nothing
passages.text:
You've been nursing this for so long. Obsessing over them every second of the day. Nightmares. Fantasies of revenge. Fantasies of reconciliation.

You feel nothing.

The people you both were no longer exist. No one to reason with, no one to beg, no one to resist, no one to punish.

[[Time travel]] is not real.

passages.name: wind
passages.text:
The wind through the trees is stronger. Like the sky is breathing deeper.

[[Trudge|breaks]]
<<fadeoutsound "stream.mp3">>

passages.name: marrow
passages.text:
Smells like angel eyes.

Like that radioactive white heat. Like those burns that never heal.

<<back>>

passages.name: choice
passages.text: It isn't a question of strength.\n\nIt's just pain [[overwhelming]] the body.

passages.name: Sentence Surgeon Script
desert
passages.text:
Sand, wind, sleeping under stones, sharing shade with the lizards, cupping water from hollows in rocks.

[[Time passes|transition-tower]]
<<set $desert = 1>>

passages.name: Patio
passages.text:
Night sky over <<if $sea eq 1>>salt marshes.<<endif>><<if $desert eq 1>>desert sand.<<endif>><<if $jungle eq 1>>drooping jungle trees.<<endif>>

[[Go inside|tower]]

passages.name: don't
passages.text: I am tired and sitting in a vampire chair.\n\n[[So tired|say something]]

passages.name: Slow down
passages.text:
You stand still.

The sounds remains.

Getting louder.

It is the beating of your [[hand|warmfist]].

passages.name: reflection
passages.text: <<if $key eq 2>><<print $eyes>> eyes, lips <<print $lips>>, <<print $nose>> nose, <<print $other>>, and <<if $wound eq "jaw">>that horrible melted jaw<<endif>><<if $wound eq "heart">>that hideous cold expression<<endif>><<if $wound eq "hand">>that ugly fucking hand<<endif>>.<<else>>Blank skin stretched by underlying bones and cartilage. The suggestion of a jaw, nose, brow.<<endif>>\n\n[[Look away|Fountain]]

passages.name: last casino
passages.text:
A neon palace floating on a cloud of underlighting and fountain brilliance.

The Demon Carriage. 

[[Go inside|Demon Carriage]]

passages.name: windows
passages.text: [[Hands|strangle]] plaster the window of the [[cottage|hands]] like darkening locusts, palms slapping against the glass, fingers spasming like fat spider legs.

passages.name: weapon
passages.text:
My problems are twisted between physical and spiritual space, untouchable, too close, gone,

[[I don't want to go back to that dark place|anorexic-darkness]]

links.text: I don't want to go back to that dark place

passages.name: stronger
passages.text:
You felt dead years ago but somehow you're still standing.

Lost control of your body, changed into a hysterical woman, changed into something inhuman. Changed against your will until you started doing it to yourself.

[[You have attained the grace of water|grace]]

[[Your anger is a hot knife someone forgot in the fire|hot knife]]

links.text: You have attained the grace of water
Your anger is a hot knife someone forgot in the fire

passages.name: face
passages.text:
I'm sneerstuck, jaw-melty, exposed teeth, just the half of my <<print $lips>>, I can't stop smiling.

[[Smile|accept]]

<<set $wound = "jaw">>

passages.name: x-darkness
passages.text: <<timedgoto "x" 3s>>

passages.name: city
passages.text:
Towering structures shrouded in radiant mist, surrounded by a graveyard of slot machines.

New Heart City was zoned exclusively for [[casinos]]. They said it would be the world's ultimate recreational mecca, but the casino bubble burst.

The [[elevator]] is west.

The city [[awaits|demon]].

passages.name: jungle
passages.text:
Mosquitos bite you, sweat sticks to your skin, thorns and sap eat at your clothes.

[[Time passes|transition-tower]]

<<set $jungle = 1>>

passages.name: clean
passages.text: <<set $hands = 0>>You [[shove]] the trembling hands inside the <<cyclinglink $stash "fireplace" "closet" "garbage disposal" "icebox">>.

passages.name: clearing
passages.text:
A clearing of pure white. Branches like bone, leaves like wax, dirt like gypsum.

[[Black skeletons]] litter the clearing. The [[marrow]] is melted.

Sound of [[water|creek]] flowing beyond the clearing.

passages.name: Drink water
passages.text: [[Glug glug glug.|water]]<<set $water -= 1>>

passages.name: dream
passages.text:
You wake to silence. Throat dry.

The sky is dark grey. You can't figure it for morning or night.

[[Find something to drink|thirsty]]

[[Check napsack]]
<<stopsound "sea.mp3">>
<<stopsound "desert.mp3">>
<<stopsound "jungle.mp3">>

passages.name: hurt you
passages.text: How'd the angel [[hurt]] you?
